hash(byte[], String) - Static method in class security.PasswordHash

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class WinV
The main method does the following initiations: 1 Parses the command line. 2 Resolves the rmi object address. 3 Sets up the registry if not disabled. 4 Binds a server object to the registry. 5 Inserts the rmiadress in the index.html file. 6 Starts the http server. 7 Resolves the server address and displays it.
